title: Creating a Digital Pedagogy: Exploring Online Learning Methods to Increase STEM Graduates
description: Students in the United States of America are falling behind in the global competition for employment in technological fields. The technology that led to this surge in competition may also be used to recreate this countryâ€™s educational system to prepare students for current and future technological industries. Doing so may improve the national economy, increase STEM graduates, improve tech employment diversity, and prepare students for the ever changing demands of companies in the Information Age.
